answerText: A Good Man is Hard to Find [10] A Good Man is Hard to Find is a collection by this American author, who wrote about the preacher Hazel Motes in her novel Wise Blood and also penned the collection Everything that Rises Must Converge.
heading: ACF Winter |2009 | UC Los Angeles B and Iowa | 17 | Literature | American | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: Among its stories is one in which Mr. Head and his grandson Nelson travel into Atlanta, as well as one in which Tom Shiftlet leaves Lucynell shortly after marriage; these are "The Artificial Nigger" and "The Life You Save May Be Your Own."  [10] Name this collection which also features a story with the supposed Bible salesman Manley Pointer, "Good Country People," as well as its title story, in which Bailey's car accident causes the death of his family and his mother.
